ComponentDescription: GStreamer Pipeline for Lookout for Vision inference

aws.greengrass.lookoutvision:mqttproxy:1.policyDescription: Allows access to publish to all topics.

run.script: gst-launch-1.0 -e videotestsrc num-buffers=10 pattern=ball ! 'video/x-raw, format=RGB, width=1280, height=720' ! videoconvert ! lookoutvision server-url=unix-abstract:aws.lookoutvision.inference-server model-component=SampleComponentNameX86TargetPlatform ! mqttpublisher ! videoconvert ! jpegenc ! filesink location=./anomaly.jpg --gst-plugin-path=/greengrass/v2/
